Pre-Game Insights: Argentina and Ecuador will face off in the Copa America 2024 Quater-Finals on July 4, 2024.
Lionel Messi and his teammates are aiming to win another Copa America title following their victory in the World Cup held in Qatar in 2022.
Argentina is widely regarded as the top contender for the tournament, with Brazil also considered a strong contender.
Ecuador is ranked 31st, and it’s been a while since Argentina and Ecuador faced off on the football pitch.
Lionel Scaloni has the luxury of having both Julian Alvarez and Lautaro Martinez available for selection this summer.
Enner Valencia, Ecuador’s all-time leading goal scorer, will be the key player to make a significant impact.
Argentina vs Ecuador Predicted Lineups: Argentina's predicted lineup includes Franco Armani (River Plate), Gonzalo Montiel (Nottingham Forest), Nahuel Molina (Atletico Madrid), Cristian Romero (Tottenham), German Pezzella (Real Betis), Lucas M. Quarta (Fiorentina), Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica), Lisandro Martinez (Manchester United), Marcos Acuna (Sevilla), and Nicolas Tagliafico (Lyon).

Ecuador's predicted lineup includes Alexander Dominguez (LDU Quito), Angelo Preciado (Sparta Prague), Felix Torres (Corinthians), Joel Ordonez (Club Brugge), Jose Hurtado (Red Bull Bragantino), Piero Hincapie (Bayer Leverkusen), Willian Pacho (Eintracht Frankfurt), Andres Micolta (Pachuca), Jackson Porozo (Kasimpasa), Layan Loor (Universidad Catolica), and Enner Valencia (Internacional).
